page.title: 14Religion
page.content: Seema, aged 11:- I am a Hindu. I come from India. We are not allowed to eat beef or pork. We eat fruit and vegetables. We pray about 3 or 4 times a day. There is a temple in East Ham. My family sometimes goes there but we mostly pray at home. We also have a holy book called the Grunth Saheeb. I like my religion. Abdul, aged 10:- I am a Muslim. In mosque we do Namaz. Namaz is praying to Allah. We say the word silently. Before we do Namaz we do Wadu - first we wash our hands, then we do the following things 3 times - swill our mouth, wash our nose, our face, our arms, our hands and our feet.
